title: uhhh when did Riot change the definition of Assassin?
body:
Jhin, Vi, Fiora, Xerath, Irelia, Jax, Yi, Malzahar, Tryndamere Teemo, Tristana, Xin Zhao.... not asssassins i reckon

also Yorick is a "Mage" ?

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/a/psPhe

Yorick is only a Mage in the shop.

In the champion page and in the champion icon thing, he isn't

If Azir can be a marksman, then i guess anyone can be whatever the fuck they want...

A bit like genders now days, apparently.
Could you clarify where you are seeing this?

in the shop

in this forum when you type "assassin" into the champion icon thing

It appears that the champions classified as assassins that shouldn't obviously be there are because of their high damage scaling and therefore their potential for fast or isolated picks/kills. Most of them also seem to specialise in destroying single enemies rather than groups.

As for Yorick, he pretty much is a mage now, much of his potential comes from his abilities, which are all pretty magic-y.
